info.author: Eric Casteleijn
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

A Simple OAI Provider for the Silva Content Management System.

See:

http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html

for more information on OAI-PMH.

To use in Silva, put the IOAIProvider marker interface on any
container. After that, calling /oaipmh with any correct oai pmh
querystring should work.


Changelog
=========

0.1a1 (2009-01-13)
------------------

* Initial release
info.name: silva.app.oaiprovider
info.html_description:
Introduction

A Simple OAI Provider for the Silva Content Management System.

See:

http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html

for more information on OAI-PMH.

To use in Silva, put the IOAIProvider marker interface on any container. After that, calling /oaipmh with any correct oai pmh querystring should work.

Changelog

0.1a1 (2009-01-13)

  • Initial release
